attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I call on the Prime Minister to set up a new National Holiday, to celebrate Pirates, as I believe that Pirates are left out in everyday life, which is unfair, and need they a voice. So I call on him to create a new public holiday "Natonal Pirate Day"

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
